intro: A collection of my design work including featured projects with detailed case studies and side projects that showcase my exploration and learning journey.

featured_projects.title: Restaurant Ordering System
featured_projects.description: With its user-friendly interface and efficient order management, the samgyupsal ordering system web app enhances customer satisfaction and helps restaurant owners optimize their operations for a smoother and more delightful dining experience.

featured_projects.title: Motion Capture System
featured_projects.description: The NextJS-based frontend offers a user-friendly interface for easy access and control of motion capture functionality, while the NodeJS backend manages data processing, storage, and communication with the Python-based camera module.

featured_projects.title: Student Record Management System
featured_projects.description: Platform designed to securely store, manage, and organize student-related information and data, including academic records, grades, and personal details.
